availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Madison Meng (Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, farmer. Prince William County, Virginia, native. Son of Charles Meng and Victoria Tebbs Meng. Married to Amanda Malvina Hall Meng. Father of Charles H. Meng and James Meng. Resident of Prince William County, Virginia. Teacher in Nicholas County, Kentucky in 1833. Farmer in Bourbon County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 1, p. 294A.
Bourbon, Harrison, Nicholas, and Scott Counties, Kentucky History, Edited by William Henry, (Chicago: O. L. Baskin, 1882), 529-30.
"James Madison Meng (1812-1885)," Find A Grave, Memorial #54525000, accessed May 22, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/54525000.
